cs4620.ray1.surface

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs4620.ray1.surface.Surface
      • cs4620.ray1.surface.Box

  • public class Box
extends Surface
    A class that represents an Axis-Aligned box. When the scene is built, the Box is split up into a Mesh of 12 Triangles.
    Author:
    sjm324

      • intersect

        public boolean intersect(IntersectionRecord outRecord,
                Ray ray)
        Description copied from class: Surface
        Tests this surface for intersection with ray. If an intersection is found record is filled out with the information about the intersection and the method returns true. It returns false otherwise and the information in outRecord is not modified.
        Specified by:
        intersect in class Surface
        Parameters:
        outRecord - the output IntersectionRecord
        ray - the ray to intersect
        Returns:
        true if the surface intersects the ray
